hero.title: Hello, I'm Cloves Henrique
hero.subtitle: Data and Development Specialist
hero.description: I transform data into insights and build digital solutions that drive business growth

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm Henrique, a professional passionate about transforming data into insights and building robust digital solutions. With experience in data analysis, web development, and process automation, I always seek to enhance my skills and deliver high-impact results.
about.description2: My approach is always focused on understanding business needs and applying the best technologies to solve complex challenges efficiently and scalably.

skills.title: Skills and Technologies
skills.description: I master a wide range of technologies and tools for data analysis, web development, and automation

databases.title: Databases
databases.description: SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL and data modeling

mba.title: MBA Data Science & Analytics
mba.description: Specialization in Data Science with focus on Machine Learning, covering statistics, data analysis, big data, artificial intelligence and advanced tools for extracting insights and supporting strategic decision making.

graduation.title: Management – Information Technology
graduation.description: Focused on planning, organizing and controlling IT resources, addressing governance, information security, project management, infrastructure and technological innovation, with emphasis on strategic alignment between technology and business.
